name: Glory to the Unknown Soldier
obverse: A winged woman receives the body of a dead soldier held up by three women in front of the Arc de Triomphe.
reverse: The Tomb of the Unknown Soldier with a wreath and flowers around it. The wreath has a hanging medal on it.
reverse_inscriptions: ICI REPOSE UN SOLDAT FRANÇAIS MORT POUR LA PATRIE 1914 1918
description: This medal was made to commemorate the unknown soldier.
